Text.Page:
The first time I saw this vessel, there were only five soldiers on board. Not only is there a storm rolling in, but it looks like two full pirate crews coming at us.

I don't know who else is on board, but you'd better get ready. Five soldiers are no match for this many opponents.Defeat all enemies within the time limit to receive additional rewards.
Are you ready to start your voyage?<TEXTBUTTON>Start</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Confirm</EVENTPAGEBUTTON></EVENTPAGEBUTTON><CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>Cancel</CLOSEPAGEBUTTON>
